sentences.en: But Hooper, my newest - joined platoon leader , grudged them their life of privilege.
sentences.cn: 但是, 我们最近来的排长胡珀, 嫉妒那些人舒服生活.

sentences.en: He couldn't visualize either Martinez or Brown as platoon sergeant.
sentences.cn: 他不信马丁内兹和布朗有谁能当得了排里的当家上士.

sentences.en: He is being guarded by a platoon of police.
He might end up in command of the platoon.
sentences.cn: 说不定这个排到头来还得由他来指挥呢.

sentences.en: His platoon was probing the enemy from an advanced position.
sentences.cn: 他的排正在前沿阵地外面搜索敌人.

sentences.en: I have stationed another platoon on the island.
sentences.cn: 我已向那个岛派出了又一个排的守军。

sentences.en: In his platoon he had thirty - two men.
It'softened the edge of his satisfaction at being given a platoon.
sentences.cn: 他当上排长后的一团兴致,这一下顿时就有点泄气了.

sentences.en: Platoon sergeants fell their men in on the barrack square.
sentences.cn: 排长们在营房广场上整顿队伍.

sentences.en: Seeing the platoon leader returning, everybody rushed up to meet him.
sentences.cn: 看见排长回来了, 大家赶忙迎上去.

sentences.en: That’s hardly an army. It’s not even a platoon.
sentences.cn: 这根本算不上一个军队，甚至连一个排都算不上。

sentences.en: The platoon ain't gonna be hanging around the beach forever.
sentences.cn: 侦察排总不见得会永远在海滩上闲荡吧.

sentences.en: The platoon made its way to the pre - arranged rendezvous in the desert.
sentences.cn: 这个排向事先约定的沙漠中的会合点进发.

sentences.en: The platoon mustered for roll call.
The platoon pulled back to safety.
sentences.cn: 这一排士兵撤回到了安全地带.

sentences.en: There isn't anybody can handle the platoon better than you.
sentences.cn: 咱们这个排,谁带起来也比不上你.

sentences.en: There was that platoon leader Graft whom Dalleson had mentioned.
sentences.cn: 带队的那个克洛夫特,达尔生还称赞过他.

trans.tran_en: a small group of soldiers which is part of a  company  and is led by a  lieutenant
